Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Yoodhaa Than Sagodhararai Vittu, Adhullaam Ooraanaagiya Eeraa Ennum Oru Manidhanidaththil Poichserndhaan.
2 ange Yoodhaa, Soovaa Ennum Perulla Oru Kaanaaniyanudaiya Kumaaraththiyaik Kandu, Avalai Vivaagampanni, Avalode Serndhaan.
3 aval Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal; Avanukku Er Endru Perittaan.
4 aval Marupadiyum Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukku Onaan Endru Perittaal.
5 aval Marupadiyum Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukkuch Selaa Endru Perittaal; Aval Ivanaip Perugirapodhu, Avan Keseepile Irundhaan.
6  Yoodhaa Than Mooththamaganaagiya Er Enbavanukkuth Thaamaar Ennum Perulla Oru Pennaik Kondaan.
7 yoodhaavin Mooththamaganaagiya Er Enbavan Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaadhavanaayirundhadhinaal, Karththar Avanai Azhiththup Pottaar.
8 appozhudhu Yoodhaa Onaanai Nokki: Nee Un Thamaiyan Manaiviyaich Serndhu, Avalai Maiththunach Sudhandharamaaip Padaiththu, Un Thamaiyanukkuch Sandhadhiyai Undaakku Endraan.

9 andhach Sandhadhi Than Sandhadhiyaayiraadhendru Onaan Arindhapadiyinaale, Avan Than Thamaiyanudaiya Manaiviyaich Serumpodhu, Than Thamaiyanukkuch Sandhadhiyundaagaadhapadikkuth Than Viththaith Tharaiyile Vizhavittuk Keduththaan.
10 avan Seydhadhu Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaadhadhaayirundhadhinaal, Avanaiyum Avar Azhiththuppottaar.

11  Appozhudhu Yoodhaa, Than Kumaaranaagiya Selaavum Avan Sagodharar Seththadhupolach Saavaan Endru Anji, Than Marumagalaagiya Thaamaarai Nokki: En Kumaaranaagiya Selaa Periyavanaagumattum, Nee Un Thagappan Veettile Kaimpennaaith Thangiyiru Endru Sonnaan; Andhappadiye Thaamaar Poith Than Thagappan Veettile Thangiyirundhaal.

12  Aneganaal Sendrapin, Soovaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Yoodhaavin Manaivi Mariththaal. Yoodhaavinudaiya Thukkam Aarinapin, Avan Adhullaam Ooraanaagiya Than Sinegidhan Eeraavudane Thimnaavile Than Aadugalai Mayirkkaththarikkiravargalidaththirkup Ponaan.
13 appozhudhu: Un Maamanaar Thammudaiya Aadugalai Mayirkkaththarikkath Thimnaavukkup Pogiraar Endru Thaamaarukku Arivikkappattadhu.

14 selaa Periyavanaagiyum Thaan Avanukku Manaiviyaagak Kodukkappadavillai Endru Aval Kandapadiyaal, Than Kaimpenmaikkuriya Vasthirangalaik Kalaindhupottu, Mukkaadittuth Thannai Moodikkondu, Thimnaavukkup Pogira Vazhiyilirukkira Neerootrugalukku Munbaaga Utkaarndhaal.
15  Yoodhaa Avalaik Kandu, Aval Than Mugaththai Moodiyirundhapadiyaal, Aval Oru Vesi Endru Ninaiththu,
16 andha Vazhiyaai Avalidaththil Poi, Aval Than Marumagal Endru Ariyaamal: Naan Unnidaththil Serumpadi Varuvaayaa Endraan; Adharku Aval: Neer Ennidaththil Serumpadi, Enakku Enna Tharuveer Endraal.
17  Adharku Avan: Naan Mandhaiyilirundhu Oru Vellaattuk Kuttiyai Anuppugiren Endraan. Adharku Aval: Neer Adhai Anuppumalavum Oru Adaimaanam Koduppeeraa Endraal.

18  Appozhudhu Avan: Naan Unakku Adaimaanamaaga Enna Kodukkavendum Endru Kettaan. Adharku Aval: Ummudaiya Muththirai Modhiramum Ummudaiya Aaramum Ummudaiya Kaikkolum Kodukkavendum Endraal. Avan Avaigalai Avalukkuk Koduththu, Avalidaththil Serndhaan; Aval Avanaale Karppavadhiyaagi,
19  Ezhundhupoi, Than Mukkaattaik Kalaindhu, Than Kaimpenmaikkuriya Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondaal.
20 yoodhaa Andha Sthireeyinidaththil Irundha Adaimaanaththai Vaangikkondu Varumpadi Adhullaam Ooraanaagiya Than Sinegidhan Kaiyile Oru Vellaattukkuttiyaik Koduththanuppinaan; Avan Avalaik Kaanaamal,
21 avvidaththu Manidharai Nokki: Vazhiyandai Neerootrugal Aruge Irundha Thaasi Enge Endru Kettaan; Adharku Avargal: Inge Thaasi Illai Endraargal.
22 avan Yoodhaavinidaththil Thirumbi Vandhu: Avalaik Kaanom, Ange Thaasi Illaiyendru Avvidaththu Manidharum Sollugiraargal Endraan.
23 appozhudhu Yoodhaa: Idho, Indha Aattukkuttiyai Anuppinen, Nee Avalaik Kaanavillai; Namakku Avakeerththi Varaadhapadikku, Aval Adhaik Konduponaal Pogattum Endraan.

24 erakkuraiya Moondrumaadham Sendrapinbu Un Marumagalaagiya Thaamaar Vesiththanampanninaal, Andha Vesiththanaththinaal Karppavadhiyumaanaal Endru Yoodhaavukku Arivikkappattadhu. Appozhudhu Yoodhaa: Avalai Veliye Konduvaarungal, Aval Sutterikkappadavendum Endraan.

25 aval Veliye Konduvarappattapodhu, Aval Than Maamanidaththukku Andha Adaimaanaththai Anuppi: Indhap Porutkalai Udaiyavan Evano Avanaale Naan Karppavadhiyaanen; Indha Muththirai Modhiramum Indha Aaramum Indhak Kolum Yaarudaiyavaigal Paarum Endru Solli Anuppinaal.
26 yoodhaa Avaigalaip Paarththarindhu: Ennilum Aval Needhiyullaval; Avalai En Kumaaranaagiya Selaavukkuk Kodaamarponene Endraan. Appuram Avan Avalaich Seravillai.
27 avalukkup Pirasavakaalam Vandhapodhu, Aval Karppaththil Rattaip Pillaigal Irundhana.
28  Aval Perukirapodhu, Oru Pillai Kaiyai Neettinadhu; Appozhudhu Maruththuvachchi Adhin Kaiyaip Pidiththu, Adhil Sivappunoolaik Katti, Idhu Mudhalaavadhu Velippattadhu Endraal.

29 adhu Than Kaiyaith Thirumpa Ulle Vaangikkondapodhu, Adhin Sagodharan Velippattaan. Appozhudhu Aval: Nee Meerivandhadhenna, Indha Meerudhal Unmel Nirkum Endraal; Adhinaale Avanukkup Paares Endru Peridappattadhu.
30 pirpaadu Kaiyil Sivappunool Kattiyirundha Avanudaiya Thambi Velippattaan; Avanukku Seraa Endru Peridappattadhu.
